body: @jazzboy: You've never seen a living weapon before that in standard natural form is some sort of large insect mech but in human form is sexy dark skinned elf? Are you new to anime and hentai?  Okay moving on. in other news its always a treat to see Muramasa's mom (the one with the short hair) getting some action since in the original game she didn't really get a chance (actually bunch of the female characters in the game kinda got skip out for legit sex scenes, wasted chances)
